extendedInfo.description: The best of Live-brary.com is now available in a mobile format.  Download eBooks and eAudiobooks or search databases for free!  Follow us on Twitter or Facebook, and find out whatâs happening at your local Suffolk County, NY library.  Use your phone to search the catalog, place holds, renew items, and more - even when your library is closed.  More features added all the time.  Brought to you by the Public Libraries of Suffolk County, NY.

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Would be great if all Suffolk libraries were incorporated into the search function.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the site,  hate the app.
reviews.comment: I love the website,  but the app just doesn\'t do it for me.  It seems I don\'t get the same search results,  and I can\'t search by format.  The sign in on the app asks for username and password,  but I can\'t sign up for one.  The website just goes by my barcode and library.  I  could think of  more,  but I\'m not going to waste my time.  - android galaxy tab &  droid 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love my library!
reviews.comment: Live-brary is a great service for Suffolk County. I love having my library and all it has to offer right here at my fingertips.
reviews.author: A Google User
